messages.HeartBeat

  • Packages that use HeartBeat 
    Package Description
    ledger  
    rpc  
    state_helpers  

    • Uses of HeartBeat in ledger

      Methods in ledger with parameters of type HeartBeat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Ledger.receiveConfirmation(HeartBeat hb, RoutingTable rt)
      Receive a 'True' Heartbeat Message from a Follower and update Ledger accordingly.
      void Ledger.update(HeartBeat hb)
      This method is used by followers, and updates the ledger based on the heartbeat.

    • Uses of HeartBeat in state_helpers

      Methods in state_helpers with parameters of type HeartBeat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Candidate.HandleHeartBeat(HeartBeat hb, HostInfo host_info)
      This method handles heartbeats received from a leader while the node is currently in a candidate state.
      static void Follower.HandleHeartBeat(HeartBeat hb, Ledger ledger, HostInfo host_info)
      This method handles heartbeats received by the follower.
      static void Leader.HandleHeartBeat(HeartBeat hb, Ledger ledger, HostInfo host_info, RoutingTable rt)
      Handle a HeartBeat Message that is received as a Follower.
